title: 'A Most Violent Year'  Captures You And Doesn't Let Go
teaser: The new film A Most Violent Year is written and directed by J.C. Chandor. The crime drama starring Jessica Chastain takes place in New York City in 1981, one of the city's most violent years.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
